document_data.name: Ziatar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ziatar''' was a [[Half-dragon|half]]-[[green dragon]] who followed the faith of [[Cyric]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ziatar helped High Priestess [[Akanna]] take over the [[Temple of Bhaal (Forest of Wyrms)|temple]] of [[Bhaal]] in the [[Forest of Wyrms]]. After its conversion to the worship of Cyric, Ziatar assisted with the day-to-day operations.
document_data.Relationships: Her green dragon half-sister [[Morentherene]] made her lair in a cavern just outside of the temple.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Ziatar became very concerned about Akanna when the High Priestess locked herself in her quarters for a long time. Unbeknownst to both of them, Akanna was being influenced by a powerful [[illithid]] named [[Darskhelin]].
